article_title: Orkin: Washington D.C. is the third-worst city for mosquitoes in the U.S.
article_text:
Written By Ben Ross Posted: 05/18/2015, 04:49pm

Pest-control company Orkin has recently released its list of cities with the most mosquito-related service calls, and the results are a bit surprising in that there’s just one Florida city in the top-20.

Washington D.C. took third overall on the list, just behind Atlanta and Chicago.

According to Dcist, three people in D.C. contracted West Nile virus in 2014, up two from the year before.

The full list can be found below:

article_metadata.description: A report from pest-control company Orkin states that D.C. is one of the worst cities in America for Mosquitoes.
